content.metaTitle: Living in Playa Flamenca | Family Beach Living | Orihuela Costa 2026
content.metaDescription: Complete guide to Playa Flamenca—family-friendly beaches, La Zenia Boulevard 2 min, best value in Orihuela Costa. Properties from €165k. The practical choice.
content.quickAnswer: Playa Flamenca is Orihuela Costa's family-friendly sweet spot—calm shallow beaches perfect for children, La Zenia Boulevard 2 km away, and the best value coastal properties from €165,000. Just 5 minutes from Villamartin Golf and 10 minutes from hospital. Practical beach living.
content.heroIntro:
Между оживлением La Zenia и более тихими местами Punta Prima лежит Playa Flamenca — сообщество, которое практически, а не претенциозно подходит к прибрежной жизни. Пляж здесь имеет спокойные мелкие воды, которые ценят родители, мягкий склон песка, который нравится детям, и достаточно места, чтобы летние толпы не казались подавляющими.

Секрет Playa Flamenca — его практичность. La Zenia Boulevard находится в 2 км — достаточно близко для удобного шоппинга, достаточно далеко, чтобы район сохранял свой жилой характер. Гольф-клуб Villamartin находится в 5 минутах. Больница находится в 10 минутах. Цены обычно на 10-15% ниже, чем в La Zenia, предлагая аналогичный доступ к пляжу и лучшую близость к гольфу.

Для покупателей, ищущих ценность, удобство для семей и практическое удобство без премиальных цен, Playa Flamenca предоставляет необходимое.

lifestyleSection.intro:
Life in Playa Flamenca is comfortably suburban-coastal. Morning beach walks, school runs (good international options nearby), shopping at the Boulevard, evening barbecues. It's less glamorous than Cabo Roig, less commercial than La Zenia, less pretentious than Campoamor. It's practical—and for many, that's exactly right.

The community is established and family-oriented, with British, Scandinavian, and other European residents. English is widely spoken. Integration happens through children's activities, golf clubs, and the natural community of beach life. It's welcoming without being overwhelming.
highlights: Family-friendly beach with calm, shallow waters
La Zenia Boulevard just 2 km—convenient shopping
Best value in coastal Orihuela Costa—10-15% less than La Zenia

amenitiesSection.beaches: Playa Flamenca beach is ideal for families—calm shallow waters, gentle sand slope, Blue Flag quality. Less crowded than La Zenia beach while offering similar facilities including lifeguards and beach bars. Cala Mosca provides a rockier alternative. La Zenia beach is just 1 km north for variety.
amenitiesSection.dining: Local restaurants and bars around the commercial center offer good everyday options. The beachfront has chiringuitos for casual dining. La Zenia Boulevard (2 km) provides extensive restaurant variety. For special occasions, Cabo Roig's harbor (5 km) has excellent seafood.
amenitiesSection.shopping: Local commercial center covers daily needs—supermarkets, pharmacies, banks. La Zenia Boulevard (2 km) offers 150+ stores for serious shopping. The Saturday market adds local produce and character. Excellent combination of convenience and choice.
amenitiesSection.healthcare: Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja is 8 km (10 minutes)—good access. Local medical centers and pharmacies in the commercial area. Healthcare infrastructure suits the family-oriented community.
amenitiesSection.transport: Alicante-Elche Airport is 52 km (40 minutes via AP-7). Good central location within Orihuela Costa. A car is useful but the area is more walkable than some—beach, shops, and restaurants accessible on foot from most properties.

content.propertyMarketSection:
Playa Flamenca offers the best value in coastal Orihuela Costa. New build apartments start from around €165,000-280,000, townhouses from €220,000-380,000, and villas from €350,000-550,000. Prices are typically 10-15% less than equivalent La Zenia properties.

The market attracts families, value-focused buyers, and those who prioritize practical convenience. Rental potential is good—families seek the calm beaches and Boulevard access. Properties with pools perform well in the rental market.

Resale properties offer additional value for those seeking immediate occupation or established gardens. The area has matured nicely with good community infrastructure.
whyLiveHereSection: Best value in coastal Orihuela Costa

faqs.question: Is Playa Flamenca good for families?
faqs.answer: Excellent. The beach has calm, shallow waters ideal for children. International schools are nearby. The community is family-oriented. La Zenia Boulevard provides family-friendly shopping and entertainment. It's one of the best family locations on Orihuela Costa.

faqs.question: How does Playa Flamenca compare to La Zenia?
faqs.answer: Playa Flamenca is 10-15% cheaper while offering similar beach access and better golf proximity. La Zenia has the Boulevard on its doorstep; Playa Flamenca is 2 km away. Playa Flamenca is more residential and family-focused; La Zenia is more commercial. Both are excellent.

faqs.question: What are property prices in Playa Flamenca?
faqs.answer: Apartments from €165,000, townhouses from €220,000, villas from €350,000. Best value in coastal Orihuela Costa—typically 10-15% less than La Zenia.

faqs.question: How far is La Zenia Boulevard from Playa Flamenca?
faqs.answer: Just 2 km (5 minutes drive, 20 minutes walk). Close enough for convenient shopping, far enough to maintain residential character.

faqs.question: Is Playa Flamenca good for golf?
faqs.answer: Excellent access. Villamartin (5 min), Las Ramblas (7 min), Campoamor (8 min), Las Colinas (12 min). Central location provides great variety.

faqs.question: What is the beach like in Playa Flamenca?
faqs.answer: Blue Flag quality with calm, shallow waters—ideal for families and children. Golden sand, gentle slope, less crowded than La Zenia. Lifeguards and beach bars in season.

faqs.question: Is English widely spoken in Playa Flamenca?
faqs.answer: Yes, with established British and international community. Most services cater to English speakers. Family-oriented community is welcoming.

faqs.question: Is there a market in Playa Flamenca?
faqs.answer: Yes, Saturday market in the commercial center area. Fresh produce, clothing, household items. Adds local character alongside the convenience of nearby Boulevard shopping.

faqs.question: Is Playa Flamenca good for rental investment?
faqs.answer: Good potential. Families seek the calm beaches and Boulevard access. Properties with pools perform well. Value pricing means better yields than higher-priced neighboring areas.

faqs.question: Is Playa Flamenca suitable for permanent living?
faqs.answer: Excellent for families and those seeking practical convenience. Year-round services, good community infrastructure, family-oriented atmosphere. Less suitable for those seeking excitement or exclusivity.

content.conclusion:
Playa Flamenca doesn't seek attention—it just delivers practical coastal living at sensible prices. The beach suits families, the Boulevard is close, the golf is accessible, and the community is established. For buyers who prioritize value and convenience over glamour and exclusivity, Playa Flamenca is the smart choice.
